EmailTemplate.name: Install Reschedule
EmailTemplate.subject: Installation Rescheduled for {!FS_Installation_Reschedule__c.Install_Outlet__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Installation Rescheduled Notification:
Please be advised that the installation (Outlet information below) has been Rescheduled.
Outlet: {!FS_Installation_Reschedule__c.Outlet_Info__c}
Click this link https://fed.ko.com/freestyle to open the FET site. Then click {!LEFT(FS_Installation_Reschedule__c.Link, LEN(FS_Installation_Reschedule__c.Link) - 15)}{!FS_Installation_Reschedule__c.FS_Installation_Id__c} to be directed to the specific record referenced above.
